testcase.name: TC04 disardan Json Obje Kullanilabilmeli
testcase.system-out: * def baseUrl = 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' .................... passed * def pathParams = '/posts/70' ............................................ passed * def requestBody = read ("request.json") ................................. passed * def expectedResponseBody = read ("expectedResponseBody.json") ........... passed Given url baseUrl ........................................................ passed And path pathParams ...................................................... passed When request requestBody ................................................. passed And method Put ............................................................ passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And assert response.id == expectedResponseBody.id ......................... passed And assert response.title == expectedResponseBody.title ................... passed And assert response.body == expectedResponseBody.body ..................... passed And assert response.userId == expectedResponseBody.userId ................. passed
